name: Digital Work Instructions Agent
tagline: Delivers the right work instruction at the right time on the shop floor
overview: The Digital Work Instructions Agent provides shop floor operators with instant access to relevant work instructions, SOPs, and quality standards. It understands context (station, operation, product variant) and delivers just the information needed, reducing time spent searching and improving consistency.
whatItDoes: Delivers work instructions based on current station and operation
Adapts content for product variant and configuration
Provides visual aids and step-by-step guidance
Answers questions about procedures and specifications
Alerts operators to quality checkpoints and critical steps
prompts: Show me the torque sequence for this assembly
What's the inspection criteria for this weld?
Are there any alerts for this serial number?
What's the correct orientation for this component?
Show me the rework procedure for this defect type

impact.description: From minutes searching to instant delivery
Improved consistency in following correct procedures
